English: Click to change setting. Tournament mode (below) does not affect this setting nor is it ever written to your save files.
Summoned items applies to Portals, Pirate Ships, Traveling Cart, etc. and anything spawned from them.
Strange Portals and Pirate Ships can come more or less often.
Every fourth Strange Portal is 50% stronger than normal.#You can disable them or make all portals "Rare" with this option.
Rare Portals occur every fourth Strange Portal
All summoned portals are Rare Portals
Travelling Cart is only spawned on odd moons, usually 10% of#the time, starting with the ninth moon.
An animal pen allows you to stack animals. This does not. It just stops them from moving around.
Also allows Pirate Ships and Strange and Rare Portals to be moved.
Strange Portals and Pirate Ships can come more or less often.
